channel.title: Tutorials on Eclipse Vorto
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorials on Eclipse Vorto

item.title: Connecting a GrovePi to Hono
item.description: This tutorial explains how to generate a simple Python application for you GrovePi that sends sensor data to Eclipse Hono using MQTT.

item.title: Connecting a ESP8266 (Arduino) to Hono
item.description: This tutorial explains how to generate an Arduino sketch for a given Information Model and send the device data to Eclipse Hono via MQTT.
